Title: Establishes the Frederick Douglass heritage trail commission
Summary: Establishes the Frederick Douglass heritage trail commission to study the history of Frederick Douglass' travel within the state and create a heritage trail.
LawCode: Add ยง233-d, Ed L; amd ยง19.03, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to establishing the Frederick Douglass heritage trail commission
